name: In the Know LMS
description: The In the Know app provides a way for caregivers to complete their assigned training modules while on the go!  With this app, learners can:  Access learning modules anytime, anywhere, with a mobile device.  Resume courses that they started on a PC (and vice versa).  View their progress and gamification points, levels and badges.  Access their training offline by downloading the content.  For more than 20 years, In the Know has been a leader in caregiver training, providing continuing education to certified nursing assistants, home health aides, personal care aides and non-medical caregivers.
